title: Crazy In Love
lyrics:
[intro, kazoo] (Dm)  (A#)  (Gm)  (Dm) x2
 
[interlude]
(Dm) Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh no no
(A#) Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh no no
(Gm) Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh no no
(Dm) Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh no no
 
(Dm)[Pause] I look and stare, so deep in your eyes
(A#) I touch on you, more and more every time
(Gm) When you leave, I’m beggin you not to go
(Dm) Call your name two, three times in a row
(Dm) Such a funny thing for me to try to explain
(A#) How I’m feeling and my pride is the one to blame
(Gm) Yeah,  Cause I know I don’t understand
(Dm) Just how your love can do what no one else can
 
[chorus]
(Dm) Got me lookin so crazy right now
Your (A#)love’s got me lookin so crazy right now
(Gm) Got me lookin so crazy right now your touch’s
(Dm) Got me lookin so crazy right now
(Dm) Got me hoping you page me right now your kiss’s
(A#) Got me hoping you save me right now
(Gm)Lookin so crazy, your love’s got me lookin
Got me (Dm)lookin so crazy in love
 
[interlude]
(Dm) Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh no no
(A#) Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh no no
(Gm) Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh no no
(Dm) Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh no no
 
(Dm) When I talk to my friends so quietly
(A#) (Who he think he is?) look at what you’ve done to me
(Gm) Tennis shoes don’t even need to buy a new dress
(Dm) You ain’t there, ain’t nobody else to impress
(Dm) It’s the way that you know what I thought I knew
(A#) It’s the beat that my heart skips when I’m with you
(Gm)            But I still don’t understand
(Dm) Just how your love can do what no one else can
 
[chorus]
(Dm) Got me lookin so crazy right now
Your (A#)love’s got me lookin so crazy right now
(Gm) Got me lookin so crazy right now your touch’s
(Dm) Got me lookin so crazy right now
(Dm) Got me hoping you page me right now your kiss’s
(A#) Got me hoping you save me right now
(Gm)Lookin so crazy, your love’s got me lookin
Got me (Dm)lookin so crazy in love
(Gm)Lookin so crazy, your love’s got me lookin
Got me (Dm)lookin so crazy in love
 
[rap]
(Dm) Young 'Hov, y'all know when the flow is loco
(A#) Young B and the R-O-C, uh oh
(Gm) Ol' G, big homey, the one and only
(Dm) Stick bony, but the pocket is fat like Tony 
(Dm) Soprano the ROC handle like Van Axel
(A#) I shake phonies, man, you can't get next to
(Gm) The genuine article, I do not sing though
(Dm)I sling though, if anything, I bling yo
[kazoo]
A (Dm)star like Ringo, war like a Green (Gm)Beret
Crazy bring ya whole set
[rap]
(Dm)Jay Z in the Range, crazy and deranged
They (A#)can't figure him out, they like, "Hey, is he insane?"
(Gm)  Yes sir, I'm cut from a different cloth
(Dm)My texture is the best fur, chinchilla
[start “Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh, no, no”]
(Dm) I been iller than chain smokers
How you think I (A#)got the name Hova? 
I been realer, the game's over
(Gm) Fall back, Young, ever since I made the change (Dm)over
To platinum the game's been wrap, one
[sing]
(Dm)Got me looking so (A#)crazy, my baby
I'm (Gm)not myself, lately I'm (Dm)foolish, I don't do this
I've been (Dm)playing myself, baby, (G-stop)I don't care
[single strum]
'Cause your (Dm)love's got the best of me
And, baby, you're (A#)making a fool of me
You go-ot me (Gm)sprung and I don't care who sees
'Cause, baby, you (Dm)got me
(you got me, you (Dm)got me so crazy right now)(Hey)
 
[chorus]
(Dm) Got me lookin so crazy right now
Your (A#)love’s got me lookin so crazy right now
(Gm) Got me lookin so crazy right now your touch’s
(Dm) Got me lookin so crazy right now
(Dm) Got me hoping you page me right now your kiss’s
(A#) Got me hoping you save me right now
(Gm)Lookin so crazy, your love’s got me lookin
Got me (Dm)lookin so crazy in love
 
[outro]
(Dm) Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh no no
(A#) Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh no no
(Gm) Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh no no
(Dm) Uh oh, uh oh, uh oh, oh no no 
(Dm) [end]
